website_summaries.verdict: The premium HTC One A9 hits a lot of marks especially for Android users who want a smaller unlocked phone, but its camera doesn't measure up to the competition.

customer_reviews.title: The Android nougat is coming and the phone will be even better. The battery is decent
customer_reviews.text: This phone is sooo fast. The Android nougat is coming and the phone will be even better. The battery is decent, not perfect and the signal is not lost in buildings or home. The camera is excellent and the games that I play are running smoothly. Great phone. I can't wait for the nougat update.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife Happy life
customer_reviews.text: The wife loves this phone, can't really go wrong with HTC - Android.
customer_reviews.author: Dave P

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone
customer_reviews.text: Such a great phone my wife have had hers for about 2 years and it never let her down
customer_reviews.author: Lt Carré

customer_reviews.title: Love it now phone is mine only paying £6 a ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it now phone is mine only paying £6 a month for my monthly package with virgin would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Marie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Battery seemed to let it down in the end lasted 11 months
customer_reviews.text: Was really good until 11 months in when it just wont charge anymore
customer_reviews.author: James57745

customer_reviews.title: Quietly brilliant it is
customer_reviews.text: Forget iPhone, head to this Android you won't be disappointed, especially with mini SD large expandable memory.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very good design even though a bit expensive. Fingerprint sensor is really fast and battery life better than what I expected. Verry happy with this so far.
customer_reviews.author: zlilac

customer_reviews.title: This is an O2 phone not unlocked.
customer_reviews.text: As a SIM only phone, you'd expect it to be unlocked. But it's not. Mine arrived today and it's locked to O2. I'm on Vodafone. As you can imagine. I'm not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking phone but when a problem occurred after only ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking phone but when a problem occurred after only 6 months, customer service was next to useless. Won't touch another one.
customer_reviews.author: D L Frost

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works fine with no problems as did my last HTC phone hence why I bought again.
customer_reviews.author: drdrey

customer_reviews.title: Buy this phone!
customer_reviews.text: Great features, lovely design, excellent finger print scanner. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mr W. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Fast, very good camera! Didn't disappoint! The delivery was very quick as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very bad battery life and poor value for money. Nexus 5x much better choice
customer_reviews.author: Federico

customer_reviews.title: HTC's take on bettering the iPhone formula
customer_reviews.text: Best phone under 200 quid, built like a tank and is running NOUGAT now, so yeah - Amazeballs!!!
customer_reviews.author: Y.K.

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace identical model 3 years old with awful battery life. Arrived very quickly by Royal Mail, well packed and up and running within a couple of hours. HTC very easy to transfer all contacts etc.
customer_reviews.author: Alastair

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This does look a bit like a iPhone that has bred with an Android, Mum's looks but Dad's gestures. It does not have the bells and whistles that new phones often do, but as a less techie than usual user this did not worry me. It reminds me of the sort of specs you get in a Lexus car, high quality but not trying to be cutting edge German engineering. Not for Gadget Lad but maybe Gadget Dad.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Vasey

customer_reviews.title: Smart looking phone
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my partner and he is very pleased with it. Going from an old windows phone he was apprehensive of the change but has soon gotten used to it. The phone arrived well packaged and in perfect condition with a charger cable, and a packet of haribos !
customer_reviews.author: Laineybird

customer_reviews.title: Great, but...
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this phone is great. The screen is clear crisp and vibrant, it has a decent processer a surplus of ram and a good 13 mp camera. The problem with this phone, that stops it from being great is the frankly pitiful battery life. Charging to 100% overnight will barely last you a day of moderate use. Be aware that youre getting a great peice of kit but with a huge flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Timthecodgod

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend the phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone came as a brand new phone, but the charger inside was a US charger and the phone started up with the language set as Chinese, and a friend​ also had this problem, but once I got through those steps of changing the language, I would recommend the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could Have Been Better
customer_reviews.text: screen to small just like M9 and speaker not very good...
customer_reviews.author: madie28

customer_reviews.title: The best phone i've ever owned!!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent, high quality phone. Upgraded from an LG g3 and I rate it higher than the LG!! The battery life is actually pretty good however I would recommend getting a quick charge 2.0 charger which if your a heavy user will charge the phone from 10 to 80 percent in about half an hour! There's no bloatware like there is with the LG and the camera and general experience of using the phone is better. Buy this phone!! You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: jambo
